description:
All I get, is that it is unable to connect and I should try again in a few minutes. 
Does that for days
Once you understand how CUPS snap works and the use of Applications instead of "drivers", it is very good!! love it
My old printer Epson Stylus PHOTO R290 working !

This program is completely useless. Every time I have to make a print, I go to my Windows 10 machine. On a Canon TS 5050 it only prints one job! Than it stops and you have to reboot the machine to print the next one. This happens on Debian systems like Ubuntu. Even on the lastest raspbian vesion (Bullseye) it behaves like this. At least because of this I can nobody convince to use linux.

Than it stops and you have to reboot the machine to print the next one. This happens on Debian systems like Ubuntu. Even on the lastest raspbian vesion (Bullseye) it behaves like this. At least because of this I can nobody convince to use linux.
Couldn't connect my network printers without this, literally!
